articles.author: Jon Levine
articles.title: Putin warns Belarus over threats to cut gas to European Union - New York Post
articles.description: Vladimir Putin scolded his Belarusian counterpart Alexander Lukashenko over the latter’s threat to cut off gas supplies to the European Union.
articles.content:
Vladimir Putin issued a sharp rebuke to his Belarusian counterpart Alexander Lukashenko over the latter’s threat to cut off gas supplies to the European Union.
He can, I guess, its no good, though, … [+1157 chars]

articles.title: Covid in Europe: Why some countries are considering lockdowns - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: Some governments are considering reimposing unpopular lockdowns in the run-up to Christmas
articles.content: Europe has become the epicentre of the Covid-19 pandemic again, prompting some governments to consider reimposing unpopular lockdowns in the run-up to Christmas and stirring debate over whether vacci… [+3361 chars]

articles.author: Ilya Arkhipov
articles.title: Putin warns of 'nothing good' if Belarus halts gas flows to EU - News24
articles.description: President Vladimir Putin said that he’ll talk to Alexander Lukashenko about gas flows to the Europe Union after the Belarusian leader threatened to interrupt supplies to the energy-strapped continent in the face of more EU sanctions.
